parameters.name: Leader
parameters.description: True enables a leader on this symbol, false disables it

parameters.name: LeaderSide
parameters.description: Leader attachment information as defined in swLeaderSide_e

parameters.name: BentLeader
parameters.description: True enables a bent leader on this symbol, false disables it

parameters.name: AllAround
parameters.description: True enables the all around symbol on the leader, false disables it

title: IGtol.SetLeader
description: Sets the characteristics of the leader for this symbol.
signature:
void SetLeader( 
   System.Boolean
Leader
,
   System.Int32
LeaderSide
,
   System.Boolean
BentLeader
,
   System.Boolean
AllAround
)

parameters.name: Leader
parameters.description: True enables a leader on this symbol, false disables it

parameters.name: LeaderSide
parameters.description: Leader attachment information as defined in swLeaderSide_e

parameters.name: BentLeader
parameters.description: True enables a bent leader on this symbol, false disables it

parameters.name: AllAround
parameters.description: True enables the all around symbol on the leader, false disables it

remarks:
This method ignores:
LeaderSide, BentLeader, and AllAround values if the leader value is false. Use
IGtol::IsAttached
to determine if this symbol is currently using a leader.
AllAround value if the BentLeader value is false. Use
IGtol::HasExtraLeader
to determine if this symbol is using a bent leader.
Use:
IGtol::GetLeaderSide
to determine where the leader is attached to the symbol
IGtol::GetAllAround
to determine if this leader is using the all around symbol
